rows.label: bf09390150_0010
rows.name: Bandits?

rows.label: bf09390150_0020
rows.name:
Probably.
Saika looks pretty human
for a Blade, after all.

rows.label: bf09390150_0030
rows.name: Blades like that fetch a high price.

rows.label: bf09390150_0040
rows.name:
Did you know? They take photos
of Blades before they return to their Cores.

rows.label: bf09390150_0050
rows.name: Some things never change...

rows.label: bf09390150_0060
rows.name: What do you mean?

rows.label: bf09390150_0070
rows.name:
As soon as humans learn they cannot obtain
what they desire, they try to take it.

rows.label: bf09390150_0080
rows.name: ...But not everyone's like that.

rows.label: bf09390150_0090
rows.name:
They just give up instead.
But deep down, they're all the same.

rows.label: bf09390150_0100
rows.name: Then why do you bother protecting them?

rows.label: bf09390150_0110
rows.name: Why not just let them be?

rows.label: bf09390150_0120
rows.name: It's a reminder.

rows.label: bf09390150_0130
rows.name: To not forget what kind of existence humans are.

rows.label: bf09390150_0140
rows.name: Was helping me the same thing?

rows.label: bf09390150_0150
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]Hm...

rows.label: bf09390150_0160
rows.name: In the distant past...

rows.label: bf09390150_0170
rows.name: I felt like I saw a similar scene...

rows.label: bf09390150_0180
rows.name: [ML:undisp ]...?

rows.label: bf09390150_0190
rows.name: Perhaps that too...

rows.label: bf09390150_0200
rows.name: Was that also the face of humanity...?
